description:
Kids and ghosts. When young Satsuki finds an old book of spells from her passed away mother, she gains the power to fight ghosts that are haunting her new school. With the help of her friends, and of a really wicked devil cat, she must protect everyone around her or be haunted for ever more.

(Source: Anime News Network)

title.romaji: Gakkou no Kaidan: Kubinashi Rider!! Shi no Noroi
title.native: 学校の怪談 首なしライダー!! 死の呪い
title.english: Ghost Stories: The Headless Horsemen!! Curse of Death

title.romaji: Gakkou no Kowai Uwasa Shin: Hanako-san ga Kita!!
title.english: School's Scary Stories: Hanako-san ga kita!!
The Haunted House: The Secret of the Ghost Ball
